thread.title: Rain forces Meadowlands to cancel Friday thoroughbred card
thread.title_full: Rain forces Meadowlands to cancel Friday thoroughbred card

author: wtopstaff
title: Rain forces Meadowlands to cancel Friday thoroughbred card
text:
Home » News » Sports » Rain forces Meadowlands to… Rain forces Meadowlands to cancel Friday thoroughbred card By The Associated Press October 9, 2015 2:40 pm 
EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. (AP) — The Meadowlands Racetrack has cancelled its thoroughbred card on Friday night because of rain. 
The track says heavy rain forced it to call off the races scheduled to be run on the grass. 
Racing is scheduled to resume Saturday night. Topics:
